scripts.package: docker build -f docker/frontend/Dockerfile . -t cte-linux-amd64 --platform linux/amd64 && docker build -f docker/backend/Dockerfile . -t backend-linux-amd64 --platform linux/amd64 && docker save -o parkwise.tar cte-linux-amd64 backend-linux-amd64
scripts.containerized: npm run build && npm run compose
scripts.install-services: npm run install-auth && npm run install-permit && npm run install-ticket && npm run install-vehicle && npm run install-api
scripts.compose-install: npm install && npm run install-auth && npm run install-app && npm run install-enforcement
scripts.installs: npm install && npm run install-services && npm run install-app && npm run install-admin && npm run install-driver && npm run install-enforcement && npm run install-admin
scripts.test-services: npm run test-auth && npm run test-permit && npm run test-ticket && npm run test-vehicle && npm run test-api
scripts.test-apps: npm run test-app && npm run test-admin && npm run test-enforcement && npm run test-driver
scripts.test: npm run test-services && npm run test-apps
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev-auth" "npm run dev-vehicle" "npm run dev-app" "npm run dev-enforcement" "npm run dev-driver"
scripts.build-services: concurrently "npm run build-auth" "npm run build-vehicle" "npm run build-permit" "npm run build-ticket" "npm run build-api"
scripts.build: npm run build-services && npm run build-app && npm run build-driver && npm run build-enforcement && npm run build-admin
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "npm run start-auth" "npm run start-vehicle" "npm run start-permit" "npm run start-ticket" "npm run start-app" "npm run start-driver" "npm run start-enforcement" "npm run start-admin" "npm run start-api"
scripts.lint: concurrently "npm run lint-auth" "npm run lint-permit" "npm run lint-ticket" "npm run lint-vehicle" "npm run lint-api" "npm run lint-app" "npm run lint-admin" "npm run lint-driver" "npm run lint-enforcement"
